data.title: Newcom Media, leading B2B publisher of Canada.
data.meta_description: Newcom Media is Canada’s premier B2B publisher delivering information and marketing services to a wide variety of industries
data.text:
About Newcom

Family owned and operated, Newcom Media is Canada’s premier B2B publisher delivering information and marketing services to a wide variety of industries through magazines; websites; trade shows and events.

Our Motto

We serve our customers best by putting our readers first.

Our Principles

To maintain the best print and digital lists in every market we serve

To provide the best editorial product in every market we serve

To hold ourselves to the highest level of journalistic ethics

To deliver large numbers of qualified buyers to our trade shows

To be respectful, honest and straight-forward in all our business affairs

To place the interests of our customers first

To never offer a lower price to a customer who does less business with us than another

Markets Served

Home Décor, Gift, Jewelry, Fashion and Lifestyle

Meetings & Incentive Travel

Dental

ORAL HEALTH

is Canada’s only audited, national clinical publication, providing comprehensive coverage of the entire dental profession. Monthly, Oral Health has been reaching practicing dentists, dental labs, dental students, dealers, and manufacturers since 1911.

ORAL HYGIENE

speaks to hygienists as professionals, helping them build and develop clinical skills, master new products and technologies, and increase their productivity and effectiveness as key members of the dental team.

Home Décor, Gift, Jewelry, Fashion and Lifestyle

Newcom Shows manages Toronto Market Week, which includes the Mode Show, Gift and Design Market, Signatures by Hand Gift Show, and Show T.O

The gift, home, fashion and lifestyle source for Canadian retailers.

Financial

CE CORNER

ESPACE FC

INVESTMENT EXECUTIVE

FINANCE ET INVESTISSEMENT

ADVISOR.CA

CONSEILLER.CA

Insurance

CANADIAN UNDERWRITER

remains the go-to publication of Canada’s property and casualty insurance market. Through its website, monthly magazine, and daily newsletter, Canadian Underwriter delivers the news, analysis, and insight that insurance and risk professionals need to succeed.

Meetings + Incentive Travel

CANADIAN MEETINGS + EVENTS EXPO

formerly IncentiveWorks is Canada’s largest trade show and conference for the business events industry. Held annually since 1992, it connects suppliers with the professionals who organize meetings, incentive travel programs, conferences, and other events.

Trucking

TODAY'S TRUCKING

is the national business magazine of Canada’s trucking industry. With a focus on context and analysis, the publication hones in on topical issues with deep dives into regulatory and management matters as well as new products and technologies.

TRUCK NEWS

is the official website of Today's Trucking. It is home to a daily news service that focuses on Canada's trucking industry, and is supported by an array of in-depth features, opinions and analyses.

TRANSPORT ROUTIER

is the business resource for the entire Quebec trucking industry. Our French-language magazine serves the information needs of truck-fleet owners/managers and other decision makers with unmatched insight and analysis of issues and technologies.

Trucking Trade Shows

is the meeting place for Canada’s trucking industry, the country’s number one truck show. Held biannually in Toronto, Truck World features the latest trucks, trailers, and other equipment.

is the trade show for the entire Quebec trucking industry, featuring the latest products and ideas in the world of trucks, trailers, and equipment. ExpoCam is held in Montreal biannually, alternating years with Truck World.
